fields.label: Why you need to come Africa

value.title: Experience
value.subtitle: the exotic countries, go beyond the main streets and see the real life.

value.title: Escape
value.subtitle: from the bustle of big cities and get closer to the nature as it is.

value.title: See
value.subtitle: wild animals in the flesh. Hurry, as many of them are endangered!

final.html:
Reasons to Go on Safari

  • Experience
    the exotic countries, go beyond the main streets and see the real life.
  • Escape
    from the bustle of big cities and get closer to the nature as it is.
  • See
    wild animals in the flesh. Hurry, as many of them are endangered!
